alert.note: Alert for Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:55AM EST until January 07 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Fayette, Greene, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland and Westmoreland Counties. In West Virginia, Wetzel County. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
